data.name: Sample - Maltiverse - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Maltiverse" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

arguments.name: Maltiverse

conditions.condition: {{ (vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.status == "Success" and not vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.message is defined) or vars.useMockOutput }}

params.value:
Maltiverse Detection Summary
Classification
{% if vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data['classification'] == 'malicious' %}
{{"Malicious"}}
{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data['classification'] == 'suspicious' %}
{{"Suspicious"}}
{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data['classification'] == 'whitelist' %}
{{"Whitelist"}}
{% else %}
{{"Neutral"}}
{% endif %}
File Type
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.filetype}}
Type
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.type}}

arguments.verdict: {% if vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data['classification'] == "malicious" %}{{"Malicious"}}{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data['classification'] == "suspicious" %}{{"Suspicious"}}{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data['classification'] == "whitelist" %}{{"Good"}}{% else %}{{"No Reputation Available"}}{% endif %}

routes.name: Configuration -> Get IP Reputation
Get IP Reputation -> If Reputation is Found
If Reputation is Found -> Maltiverse Reputation Summary
routes.label: Yes

routes.label: No

routes.name: Maltiverse Reputation Summary -> Return Output Data
Start -> Configuration

workflows.name: Get File Reputation
workflows.description: Retrieves a reputation from Maltiverse for the File Hash submitted to determine if it is suspicious based on the File Hash you have specified.

routes.name: Start -> Get File Reputation
